text: The Defense of Volotchayevsk () is a 1937 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasilyev brothers.ВОЛОЧАЕВСКИЕ ДНИВолочаевские дниМурманский календарь 6 апреля. Меркурьев четыре раза снимался в Хибинах. It stars Varvara Myasnikova, Nikolai Dorokhin, and Lev Sverdlin. == Actors == * Varvara Myasnikova as Masha * Nikolai Dorokhin as Andrei * Lev Sverdlin as Col. Ushujima * Yuri Lavrov as White Guard Officer * Boris Chirkov as Old Man * Boris Blinov as Bublik * Vladimir Lukin as Egor == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1937 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Defense of Volotchayevsk
